TABLE_VALUE: select ID_ACCOUNT ID_VALUE, STRACCOUNT NAME_VALUE from OD_ACCOUNTS0
select NODE_VALUE ID_VALUE, NODE_NAME NAME_VALUE from RB_DIC_VALUE_LIST_ACC where ID_PARAM = 1 and ID_VALUE = 1
select ID_CURRENCY ID_VALUE, CURRENCY_COD NAME_VALUE from COM_CURRENCY where CURRENCY_CB <> ''
select NUM_DIVISION_GROUP ID_VALUE, NAME_DIVISION_GROUP NAME_VALUE from UBS_DIVISION_GROUP where NUM_DIVISION_GROUP > 0

select D.NUM_DIVISION ID_VALUE, D.NAME_DIVISION NAME_VALUE from UBS_DIVISION D, UBS_DIVISION_BUSINESS DB, UBS_BUSINESS B where D.NUM_DIVISION > 0 and D.NUM_DIVISION = DB.NUM_DIVISION and DB.ID_BUSINESS = B.ID_BUSINESS and B.COD_BUSINESS = 'RB'
select NODE_VALUE ID_VALUE, NODE_NAME NAME_VALUE from RB_DIC_VALUE_LIST_ACC where ID_PARAM = 3 and ID_VALUE = 1
select COLUMN_CONTENTS ID_VALUE,DECODE_CONTENTS NAME_VALUE from COM_COLUMN_DECODE where NAME_TABLE_COLUMN = 'RB_CONTRACT.TYPE_CONTRACT'
select ID_KIND_DOC ID_VALUE, NAME_KIND_DOC NAME_VALUE from RB_KIND_DOCUMENT
select ID_MODEL ID_VALUE, NAME_MODEL NAME_VALUE from RB_MODEL
select NODE_VALUE ID_VALUE, NODE_NAME NAME_VALUE from RB_DIC_VALUE_LIST_ACC where ID_PARAM = 9 and ID_VALUE = 1
